Scenic Japan Tours – 5N/6D – SIC tour

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.9″ custom_padding=”39px||37px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|53px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 1-ARRIVAL TOKYO (SIC)
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Arrival at NARITA Airport.
  • Transfer to Designated Hotel on Seat in Coach basis
  • Check in to Hotel. Day Free at leisure.
  • Overnight Stay at Hotel, Tokyo.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/f238e9ogqqq.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 2-TOKYO CITY TOUR (SIC)
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • After Breakfast proceed for TOKYO CITY TOUR
  • Gather at designated locations (hotels in Tokyo) and board the bus
  • Tokyo Tower (30 Min)
  • Imperial Palace Sakashita-mon Gate (10 Min)
  • Sensoji Temple & Nakamise Shopping Street (45 min)
  • Akihabara via Ueno (drive-by)
  • Tokyo Station Marunouchi South Exit (Drop-off)
  • Head to hotel on your own.

    Overnight Stay at Hotel, Tokyo.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/_uin-pffj7c.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”Package Image” _builder_version=”3.12″ animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 3- 1DAY MT. FUJI & HAKONE TOUR (SIC)
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • After Breakfast proceed for MT FUJI & HAKONE TOUR
  • Gather at designated locations (hotels in Tokyo) and board the bus
  • Mt. Fuji 5th Station (30 min)
  • Lake Ashi Cruise (15 min)
  • Mt. Komagatake Ropeway (50 min)
  • Depart Hakone (Depart Hakone and RETURN to TOKYO by bus)
  • This tour disbands upon arrival at   Ginza. Please head to your next destination or back to your hotel on your own after the tour.

    Overnight Stay at Hotel, Tokyo.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/8sozj8jf0s8.jpg” admin_label=”Package Image” _builder_version=”3.12″ animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 4- TOKYO-OSAKA / BULLET TRAIN (SIC)
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • After Breakfast, Proceed to Tokyo Station on your own.
  • Reach Tokyo Station.
  • Shinkansen Train from Tokyo To Osaka.
  • From Osaka station Transfer to Hotel in Osaka on your own.
  • Check in to Hotel.
  • Overnight Stay at Hotel, Osaka.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 5-OSAKA / FULL DAY KYOTO AND NARA TOUR
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Head to designated locations (hotels in Osaka) for Pickup for your Kyoto Tour.
  • Nijo Castle (50 min)
  • Kinkaku-ji Temple (45 min)
  • Kyoto Imperial Palace (40 min)
  • From Kyoto to Nara
  • Todai-ji Temple (Great Buddha)/Nara Park
  • Kasuga Taisha Shrine
  • Nara Nagomikan
  • Drop-off Service
  • Tour ends after arriving at Osaka Station.Head to hotel on your own.
  • Overnight Stay at Hotel, Osaka.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/n-cmlapjfi.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 6-DEPART OSAKA

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Breakfast at Hotel

After Breakfast, Proceed to Osaka Kansai Airport from Designated Hotel on Seat in Coach basis.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/h35exfalcds.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/kokxob8550q.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ custom_padding=”0||36px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” global_module=”117″ locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”37px|0px|27px|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.69″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.9″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″]
